Package org.opengrok.indexer.history

Interface Cache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotationCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCache, FileAnnotationCache
    public interface Cache

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        static final Logger LOGGER

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws CacheException
        Create and initialize an empty cache if one doesn't exist already.
        Throws:
        CacheException - if initialization fails

      • getInfo

        String getInfo()
        Get a string with information about the cache.
        Returns:
        a free form text string describing the history instance

      • clear

        void clear​(RepositoryInfo repository)
    throws CacheException
        Clear the cache for a repository.
        Parameters:
        repository - the repository whose cache to clear
        Throws:
        CacheException - if the cache couldn't be cleared

      • optimize

        void optimize()
       throws CacheException
        Optimize how the history is stored on disk. This method is typically called after the cache has been populated, or after large modifications to the cache. The exact effect of this method is specific to each implementation, but it may for example include compressing, compacting or reordering the disk image of the cache in order to optimize performance or space usage.
        Throws:
        CacheException - if an error happens during optimization

      • supportsRepository

        boolean supportsRepository​(Repository repository)
        Check whether this cache implementation can store history for the given repository.
        Parameters:
        repository - the repository to check
        Returns:
        true if this cache implementation can store history for the repository, or false otherwise

      • getCacheDirName

        String getCacheDirName()
        Returns:
        directory name to be used to store cache files under data root

      • clearCache

        List<String> clearCache​(Collection<RepositoryInfo> repositories)
        Remove cache data for a collection of repositories. Note that this just deals with the data, the map used by HistoryGuru will be left intact.
        Parameters:
        repositories - list of repository paths relative to source root
        Returns:
        list of repository paths relative to source root for which the cache was successfully removed

      • hasCacheForFile

        boolean hasCacheForFile​(File file)
                 throws CacheException
        Check if the specified file is present in the cache.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to check
        Returns:
        true if the file is in the cache, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • isUpToDate

        boolean isUpToDate​(File file)
            throws CacheException
        Parameters:
        file - source file
        Returns:
        whether cache entry for given file is fresh
        Throws:
        CacheException - on error

      • getCacheFileSuffix

        String getCacheFileSuffix()
        Returns:
        suffix used for the cache files
